programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a Manchester factory that churns out 6 million Jaffa Cakes every single day. McVities have been making these cakes here since 1927, and the process starts with an 18 ton delivery of wheat flour.

programme.title: Pluuto
programme.desc: 1930. aastal avastatud Pluutot Paikesesusteemi serval peeti aastakumneid tahtsusetuks jaakeraks, kuid kosmosesondi New Horizons uued avastused on jahmatanud ka teaduskogukonda. Pildid annavad tunnistust keerulisest aktiivsest maailmast jaast sepitsetud magede, naivalt liikuvate lammastikuliustike ja hiljuti pursanud vulkaanidega. See aga tahendab, et seal võib olla elu.

programme.title: Tutankhamun with Dan Snow
programme.desc: In this episode, we unravel the riddle of Tutankhamuns unusually small tomb and reveal how Tut mania, the craze of King Tut gripped the world.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong Islandil
programme.desc: Briti naitlejal ja koomikul Alexander Armstrongil seostuvad Islandiga vaid kaks marksõna: vulkaanid ja Bjork. Selleks et põneva riigi kohta rohkem teadmisi omandada, alustab ta suurt Islandi ringreisi, mille kaigus jaine saar risti-rasti labi sõidetakse. Esimeses osas naeb Alexander oma silmaga ehtsat vulkaanipurset ning avastab islandlaste trolli- ja haldjalembuse.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Kim ja Pierre taipavad, et maja ei saa enne lume tulekut valmis ning keskenduvad selle, et varuda talveks piisavalt liha. Praegu on põtradel jooksuaeg ning hea võimalus enne karmi Yukoni talve suuri ulukeid lasta. Mike lahkub jarve aarest ning suundub oma valdustesse orus. Seal pole mitu kuud keegi kainud ja nii mõnigi asi vajab parandamist. Esmalt asub ta korstna kallale. Bentley valmistub karusloomade jahihooajaks. Soodaks tuleb varuda piisavalt kala ja puhastada 250 puunist. Becky abikaasa Dene on tool ning naine lapsega uksi. Tal tuleb 11 taltsutamatut kelgukoera talveks vormi ajada.

programme.title: Kus on metsikud mehed?
programme.desc: Cambodia is located in Southeast Asia, where a British family lives that exchanged life in Europe for a new future on a tropical island. Paul, his wife and four children received the island as a gift from the local government. In return, they protect the fauna and flora in the sea around. Ben sleeps in a hammock, drinks rainwater and rediscovers old bunkers from the time of the harsh Khmer Rouge regime.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the Vale of Mowbray pork pie factory in Northallerton, Yorkshire, which began making pork pies in 1928. He visited the factory in May 2022, following production of their 75-gram snack-sized traditional pork pie - of which they made 425,000 every week. Cherry Healey reveals hacks for the perfect vegan shortcrust pastry, makes piccalilli as a pork pie accompaniment, and learns how to drive one of the HGVs that transport food products every day. In Cornwall, Ruth Goodman fishes for the history of one of Britains most unusual pies, the star gazey pie, and she explores the story of powdered egg during the Second World War.

programme.title: Aafrika
programme.desc: Ida-Aafrika loomad peavad toime tulema pidevate muutustega. Vihmaperioodid vahelduvad põuaga, vahel on kulm ja vahel palav, kord on toitu rikkalikult, siis jalle napilt. Peale alatasa randavate karjade elab siin terve hulk teisi loomi, muuhulgas sisalikud, kes napsavad karbseid lõvide nagudelt ja elevandid, kes peavad kolm paeva kestvaid lahinguid selleks, et saada õigust jargmise põlvkonna sigitamiseks.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Ka talvel tuleb Alaskal lahedalt ja kaugelt eluks vajalikke varusid hankida. Glennil õnnestub magedes karibu tabada. Chip ja Agnes viivad telgiraami kulmunud jõe aares asuvatele hiljuti paritud maadele. Andy ajab metsa sisse uue raja, et valtida Yukoni jõel ohtlikku jaad. Sue Aikens sõidab lumesaaniga tundrasse taime jarele, et ravisalvi valmistada.

programme.title: Kus on metsikud mehed?
programme.desc: Ben travels to Sweden to meet Annalisa, the Italian chose a life on the streets of Europe as a teenager, and now is developing a forest hideaway on the fringes of Swedish society for her and her toddler.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Alaskans soldier through the heart of dark winter in pursuit of the resources they desperately need for survival.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: David Harewood and best friend Fraser James swap the sets of Hollywood for a new challenge in Slovenia where they face some of the most dangerous roads in Europe.

programme.desc: Meie planeet võib pakkuda kõige erakordsemaid vaatemange kuutlevatest virmalistest rajude aikesetormide ja plahvatavate vulkaanideni. Kuid et nende põgusate hetkede ilu jaadvustada, peab olema õigel ajal õiges kohas. Kuna Maa on vulkaaniline planeet, pole midagi erutavamat kui jaadvustada seda võimsat tulevarki lahemalt kui kunagi varem.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve Backshall has just six months to travel six continents to find his Deadly 60. From lethal beauties to killer beasts, from the unseen to the unexpected, 60 unique creatures from the four corners of the globe all delivered in Steves own unique style.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the series that explores the most successful animal group on Earth, from the tiny Etruscan shrew to the largest mammal in existence - the blue whale.

programme.title: Horisont
programme.desc: Horizon follows an international team of volcanologists in Iceland as they draw fascinating parallels with the volcanoes on Earth and those elsewhere in the solar system. Through the teams research, we discover that the largest volcano of the solar system - Olympus Mons on Mars - has been formed in a similar way to those of Iceland, how a small moon of Jupiter - Io - has the most violent eruptions anywhere, and find out that a moon of Saturn called Enceladus erupts icy geysers from a hidden ocean. Computer graphics combined with original NASA material reveal the spectacular sights of these amazing volcanoes. Along the way, we learn how volcanoes are not just a destructive force, but have been essential to the formation of atmospheres and even life. And through these volcanoes of the solar system, scientists have discovered far more about our own planet, Earth- hat it was like when Earth first formed, and even what will happen to our planet in the future.

programme.title: Alexander Armstrong Islandil
programme.desc: Briti naitlejal ja koomikul Alexander Armstrongil seostuvad Islandiga vaid kaks marksõna: vulkaanid ja Bjork. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. programme.title: This Cultural Life
programme.desc: One of the worlds greatest novelists, Salman Rushdie has won many prestigious international literary awards and was knighted for services to literature in 2007. He won the Booker Prize in 1981 for Midnights Children, a novel that was also twice voted as the best of all-time Booker winners. In 1989, Iranian leader Ayatollah Khomeini declared that Rushdies fourth novel, The Satanic Verses, was blasphemous and pronounced a death sentence against its author. For over a decade, Rushdie lived in hiding with close security, a period of his life that he wrote about in the 2012 memoir Joseph Anton. His most recent book, Knife, details the horrific stabbing he survived in 2022. Talking to John Wilson, Salman Rushdie recalls his childhood in Bombay and the folk tales and religious fables he grew up with. He chooses Indian independence and partition in 1947 as one of the defining moments of his creative life, a period that formed the historical backdrop to Midnights Children. He discusses how, having first moved to England as a schoolboy and then to New York after the fatwa, the subject of migration has recurred throughout much of his work, including The Satanic Verses. Rushdie also explains how surrealism, fabulism and mythical storytelling are such an influence on his work, with particular reference to his 1999 novel The Ground Beneath Her Feet, which was inspired by the ancient Greek tale of Orpheus and Eurydice. As Rushdie says, truth in art can be arrived at through many doors.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. programme.title: BBC Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America

programme.title: Quantum Marketing
programme.desc: Lisa McKnight, Mattels Chief Brand Office, has been on the forefront of Barbies reintroduction to the world. The plastic toy brand has launched beyond store shelves onto the silver screen.

programme.title: Bloomberg Originals
programme.desc: Exploring every angle of climate change, technology, finance, sports and beyond, Bloomberg Originals is business as youve never seen it.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: Join David Westin as he dissects the latest stories and movements from Wall Street, inviting informed guests and financial experts to provide their thoughts and analysis regarding the market. He examines the impact that the current environment is having on businesses and traders, whilst looking ahead to peruse the likely changes across the financial industry. Whether its CEOs, professors or politicians, each offer their forthright opinions on the financial positives and negatives across the USA, evaluating the significance of the present climate and how they believe the country can continue to improve.

programme.title: Bloomberg the Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Yvonne Man and David Ingles give global investors unique insight into Chinas economy, with in-depth analysis and conversations with newsmakers.

programme.title: Insight with Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East and Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the regions trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak
programme.desc: Dont miss the latest and most important business news and stories from European markets, Wall Street, because overnight there is morning in Europe and around the world. The programme is hosted by Nejra Cehic, live from London with the help from Manus Cranny and some other hosts.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Take a look at the latest news in finance, economics and investment, most important business stories and the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics. Find out everything you need to know about stocks, bonds, currencies and commodities in Bloomberg Surveillance.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Sonali Basak deliver the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: Hosted by Ed Ludlow from San Francisco, California, and Caroline Hyde in New York, this captivating show focuses on global technology, innovation, and the future of business. It features original reporting and interesting interviews with various tech newsmakers- venture capitalists, CEOs, start-up entrepreneurs, and analysts.

programme.title: Bloomberg ETF IQ
programme.desc: Bloomberg ETF IQ focuses on the opportunities, risks and trends tied to the trillions of dollars in the global exchange traded funds industry. Hosted by Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Eric Balchunas.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg TVs flagship markets programme, providing key insights, analysis and context at the market close. Its a highly intelligent look at the markets that misses nothing.

programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trumps administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping todays complex economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg the Close
programme.desc: Alix Steel, Romaine Bostick and Scarlet Fu own the market-moving breaking news around the closing bell in this must-watch daily program to get an edge on equities, earnings and the economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trumps administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

Specs comes face to face with some big questions of work-life-balance. Should he be a perfect gentleman and give his partner the attention she deserves? Or spend his evening in a desperate scramble to capture an orange blob? Turns out Lamputs feeling merciful, and helps Specs hoodwink -erm- "impress" his lady. One cant help but wonder how Specs girlfriend will feel once she discovers that that diamond ring shes wearing is actually a shapechanging fugitive from a biochem lab.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the Wattersons arrive at the mall for a day of shopping, they struggle to find a space in the parking lot. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.desc: The Stump Kids head to the Baby Casino for JPs birthday and discover another piece of the cube - although they manage to acquire enough chips to win it, they are accused of cheating by Big Baby and kicked out, so Craig decides to play Big Baby at ultimate tic-tac-toe while the others steal the cube...

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: The Stump Kids meet Zeke, who has a piece of the cube and asks that they find his twin brother Hyde, who has not been found after a game of hide and seek - however, after many failed attempts to get him, Craig suddenly realises that something is amiss...

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: While trying to defend his elite gamer status Chef uses an old cheat code that brings a dangerous avatar to life.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Courtney must deliberately lose a challenge or let the entire world go back in time. Its a hard choice for her.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When Chef gets locked outside in a storm, the kids mistakenly assume hes a robber and decide to protect the Daycare... by any means necessary.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Gwen is frustrated by Beths silly belief that cartoons are real, but they visit an animation studio and discover thatBeth is right!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are at the convenience store considering playing truant. Larry warns them that if they dont take their education seriously theyll end up like him. To prove his point, Larry lets Gumball and Darwin work some of his many roles to make them appreciate the value of a good education.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin argue with the Internet and make him mad. So mad in fact that he seeks to wipe out humanity and, whilst doing so, malfunctions! The whole of Elmore is plunged into a time before technology. Its actually pretty nice. Will Gumball and Darwin decide to leave the internet unplugged?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin learn that Hector is not so happy being giant-sized. So they decide to help him by creating a potion that will shrink him down to the size of an average person. However creating a magic potion is not as easy as it sounds, and the results can go spectacularly wrong...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. / Richard has lost all of the familys money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. / Darwin joins the school marching band and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. / Rob creates a variety of spinoff Elmore shows and formats in order to replace Gumball.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Pennys family are unhappy that shes decided to come out of her shell… literally. And Penny wants her family to come out of their shell...also literally. They are at an impasse so who do they turn to in their time of trouble? Gumball of course! Needless to say he is way outside of his comfort zone...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin find themselves in serious trouble when they agree to everything the new kid in school says. The truth is they cant understand a word that he says. Peter Pepperoni has been home schooled and developed a very odd way of speaking. Due to a series of misunderstandings Gumball and Darwin end up on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: To make ends meet, the Wattersons are forced to rent out their house. However with nowhere else to stay they decide to secretly remain at the house. When they accidentally surprise their guests, an elderly pair of fainting goats, they faint...unsurprisingly. The Wattersons fear the worst and attempt to cover up this "accident".

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin rent a film but keep getting distracted./ Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias, but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball tries to look good in the school photo.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to tear themselves away from the internet, but end up falling down the Elmore Stream-hole. / Gumball and Darwin try to find a single nice quality about their neighbour, Mrs Robinson. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After being framed for feeding coffee to the squirrels in the park, Gumball proclaims that Mrs Robinson is pure evil. Darwin tells him that theres no such thing as pure evil, and sets out to prove that Mrs Robinson wasnt born evil, she just became that way because of a trauma in her past. But when he learns the true darkness of her nature, he decides she deserves her grand comeuppance.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad struggle to keep hyperactive toddler-aged Gumball from trashing the house and exhausting them they decide to buy him a pet. It works but theres a problem: every goldfish they get him is short-lived and inevitably ends up being flushed down the toilet.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad struggle to keep hyperactive toddler-aged Gumball from trashing the house and exhausting them they decide to buy him a pet. It works but theres a problem: every goldfish they get him is short-lived and inevitably ends up being flushed down the toilet.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: "When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. Gumball has through gritted teeth prepared a special dinner for Alan to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels he is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mom being sick and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind but when he finds out his Mom really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Theres never a dull moment in Elmore Junior High! Come and watch the best Gumball school episodes!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin asks for his advice on hats, Gumball suddenly cant speak and offends Darwin. Darwin is convinced Gumball said he had a fat head. But when Gumball tries to correct him, his speech and movement all start going wrong at the same time. He soon realises that he may not be the only one in Elmore having communication problems.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Leslies petals begin falling off he feels like his good looks are fading, Gumball and Darwin use everything they know about style and beauty to try and help him. The only problem is they know nothing about style or beauty. As Gumball and Darwins methods become more extreme, Leslie questions whether hes prepared to make the ultimate sacrifice for beauty.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons fear the worst when they are summoned to a Town Hall meeting, but are pleasantly surprised when theyre offered a brand new house. Until they discover its in a different state! The Mayor of Elmore has decided they are bringing down the real estate value of the entire town so the family have to prove that theyre upstanding members of the community.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: No matter what Gumball does, Carmen thinks she knows better. Gumball attempts to gain the moral high ground but fails... The only option left is to bring Carmen down to his level. 15 mins, U (2011) (CC)

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the kids find out that Moms life hasnt panned out exactly as shed hoped, they try to make her day a bit easier by taking on her chores. However, they accidentally grab her bucket list instead of her to-do list and end up attempting to tick off all of Nicoles life goals.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom wins Employee of the Month at the Rainbow factory, Richard feels like he is never celebrated for all the work he does at home. Nicole is suspicious of how much he actually does, but when Richard goes on strike, his important role in keeping things under control becomes painfully clear...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The family have waited in line outside the movie theatre all night. They are devastated when Larry tells them they wont get into the first screening of the Stellar Odyssey sequel. But, hardcore fans that they are, the Wattersons are determined to be the first to see the movie and so set about battling their way to the front of the queue.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

Darwin is especially pleased when he finds his old puppets, Frank and Howdy. However, as Darwin starts playing with them again, Gumball gradually realises that Frank and Howdy are actually playing with Darwin...

programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin give Mr Robinson a home and end up saving his marriage.

She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. 1

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame well never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some "quality time".

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Duncan takes advantage of a questionable Halloween legend to steal candy from his classmates.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When Beth is told that the impending arrival of a baby brother is about to ruin her life, she runs away to find a new family.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Izzy, convinced that Cody is an alien, embarks on a journey through space to take him back home.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Chef accidentally cooks up a killer cyborg turkey in a failed attempt to get the kids to appreciate him on Appreciation Day.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin discover the reason Dads diet wasnt working was that he was actually on ten diets: and eating a meal for each of them. They eventually manage to help him lose weight, but Richards newfound buffness also brings out his more obnoxious side.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball discovers that Rob, his old nemesis, is "neme-seeing" someone else now. Devastated that Rob has fallen out of hate with him, Gumball refuses to accept that his ex-nemesis has moved on and does his best to sabotage Robs blossoming relationship with his new foe, Banana Joe.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When they see the school bullies making fun of Sussie Gumball and Darwin decide to try and help her act less weird. They carefully observe her behavior and decide that the only thing they have to change is absolutely everything.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richards got a motorcycle helmet stuck on his head, so when he goes into a bank the terrified staff all assume hes there to rob the place and hand over a load of cash. Richard leaves with the money, completely oblivious to the fact hes just performed a stick-up. Nicole and the kids soon tell him what hes done and try to figure out a way to avoid the police manhunt and return the cash.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny celebrate a brand new arrival to the family: a body lotion that delivers incredible speed to its wearer. Yay Science! The boys quickly include the speed lotion in their morning routine, because testing inventions on yourself is always a good idea. Then its time to get out there and nab Lamput once and for all. Results are mixed. On the one hand, the "zoom oil" certainly works. On the other hand, these nerds arent really used to having a body that can actually do things. Conclusion: the docs still fail, only this time they fail really quickly. At least they get that round the world trip they were dreaming of.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: JP decides to follow his heart and tries to join the Horse Girls.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig vows to make the game of Four Square fun again.

programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Mouse Sisters hire the Looney Builders to build a cheese cafe featuring a mural by Sylvester, but it soon emerges that the artist is having a very bad day...

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. Moxie Manatee hires the Looney Builders to build an obstacle course for the Sandy Shells Preschool Games, but Lola isnt listening to her crew.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers - even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked "ollies" with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself - a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers …

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a botched update causes Maggie to reboot as "Magz", a super fun party animal, Ella, Slippy and Madhu are excited! At least until "Magz" excessive ways put them all in danger! Now, our gang have to figure out how to get Maggie 1.0 back, pronto!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a probe arrives from Madhus sibling, our gang sets off to find something amazingly special to send back! But despite their incredible adventure to obtain some super cool moon water - Madhu realizes the most special "thing" they have isnt a thing at all...

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. Its up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippys determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippys instruction. He soon realises its because Glitch saw the comet hes been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.desc: The weasels hear of Toads fear of scarecrows and use this to frighten Toad out of Toad Hall for good.

programme.title: Toad and Friends

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Kingfisher is singing a very irritating song, to everyones annoyance. Only Chief Weasel appreciates the song because he can use it to get Tinker and Smudge to obey him. But will Kingfisher now ever be able to leave the Wild Woods?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Mole is making his winter supply of jam but its Portlys birthday and Mole very generously gives everyone a jar of jam to give to Portly for a birthday present. Soon he has none left for winter. And Portly has rather a lot of jam!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbours pet gerbil.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks hes a rodent! He tries to get the gang to adopt him so he might participate in their fun and games like any other Lemming. But its not long before his new comrades start to find him rather heavy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the Lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. They see it as a fabulous trampoline and the ideal spot for an aerobics session. To win the right to have his nap, the weary bear must first contend with the super-energetic Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied "break dance" the Lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, its panic all round! Grizzy is determined to eliminate the parasites, down to the very last one. The problem is his little roommates have no desire whatsoever to be treated...

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Another heat wave: even the riverbed is dried up. One very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the Lemmings have used the last remaining bottles of water to fill their inflatable pool. He has no intention of letting the Lemmings swim in what might very well be his last chance to quench his thirst.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky, elastic threads are absolutely perfect for bungee jumping. Grizzy, who has no intention of getting caught in the web, decides to crush the insect. The only problem: he discovers that he has arachnophobia, which is seriously going to complicate the task.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner to eat in front of his favorite series. But his moment of pleasure is abruptly interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy discovers that the true "interference" is the Lemmings, who are using the TV antenna as a diving board for their water games.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to "break" his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landladys vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that its rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Nipping to the shops for a few provisions becomes a nightmare when a mile-long shopping list from his landlady and a clapped out trolley with a wonky wheel conspire to ruin his day. Subscribing to the theory that bigger is better, he constructs his own shopping trolley incorporating a petrol mower, pram wheels and an extra pair of hydraulic hands.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies cant help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landladys jewellery, its not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!

With the help of his attorney Daphne we go back over the days events at an abandoned town. / The gang force Fred to relax at a beach house. Unfortunately when a walking shark attacks the beach community the gang must solve the mystery without Fred finding out about it. Actors: Frank Welker, Grey Griffin, Matthew Lillard, Kate Micucci.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!

Soon the gang finds a werewolf is roaming around the place. Actors: Frank Welker, Grey Griffin, Matthew Lillard, Kate Micucci.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs spot Lamput in the audience of a magic show and try to catch him. The chase takes them backstage where Lamput evades the Docs with the help of different magic contraptions until Specs and Skinny unknowingly ends up on stage. They become reluctant assistants to the Magician who is about to perform some death-defying tricks - with the help of the Docs!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs, Lamput stumbles into a hole in the ground, which leads in an underground civilization with a large tribe in it! Lamput gets misunderstood as the Chosen One according to the tribes prophecy. The tribe hails Lamput as the prophet and this proves to be a huge challenge for the Docs to catch Lamput, now that Lamput is surrounded by worshippers and guards at all times!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput likes nothing more than a pleasant evening watching the night sky for UFOs. The peaceful night is ruined, of course, by those pesky Docs. Which is a shame, because its the one night where a UFO actually appears. Of the aliens who emerge from the strange craft, one bears a striking resemblance to Skinny - and naturally theres a bit of a mixup. The alien gets to live life as a Doc at the Lab. Hes pretty good at it, too. Skinny has to make his way as the pilot of a spaceship. Hes pretty bad at it too. In the end, the foreign food is the last straw, and both parties agree to resume their old lives. Lamput goes back to watching the skies.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters while trying to catch Lamput.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Gothams annual dog show is tonight, and Harley plans to compete for the prized "Best in Show" ribbon. Sensing shes up to no good, Robin decides to enter rough-and-tumble Ace the Bat-Dog to keep an eye on the thieving trickster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice, Lewis and the young star, Stella, are having the time of their lives down at the Starry Lake! But their rowdy playing wakes the Queen during her nap! She decides that the only way to get some peace and quiet is to empty the body of water! But Alice and Lewis arent going to stand by and let that happen: they decide to defend this location tooth and nail against the Queen and her Cards - the lake is the only place where the little star can come to regenerate.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: When Alice finds out that the King of Frostaland often gives presents to the Queen but never gets a single gift back, she persuades Lewis to add a new rule to the Big Book under the heading of "Gift Day." As per this new decree, anyone who receives a present on this particular day must give an even nicer one back to the person who gave it. Taking this very literally and seeing it as a competition, the King and Queen soon get into an "outmatching match," even going so far as to gift each other their respective castles! Unable to reverse it, the Queen has no choice but to set up residence in Frostaland while the King moves in to her abode!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When a cactus pops Vivies ball, Barney takes the kids on an adventure to learn more about nature.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mels in a bad mood, she has a hard time finding the "happy" in anything. Barneys magical scavenger hunt leads Mel to discover that searching for and focusing on things youre grateful for can make you feel better.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Papa tells his fractured version of the Tom Thumb story to the Bavarian mouse trio.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: There has been a wave of sock thefts from the local laundromat and the Cat and Mouse Detectives have been hired by Pontius Pig to solve the case before his laundry business goes belly up.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A prehistoric Cave Cat arrives at Rick and Gingers House.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take the scouts on a camping trip to canyon country and get more than they bargain for when a coyote pup shows up. / Papa tells his fractured version of the three Little Pigs story to the Bavarian mouse trio. / A Tom and Jerry chase through Postlewaite Manor results in major injuries to Cates which places his defense of the Butlers Linen Gloves Boxing Title in jeopardy.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Maude tasks Tom with guarding her prize pumpkin until she enters it into competition at the county fair.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom breaks his leg during a chase. While in his wheelchair, he witnesses what seems like the kidnapping of Misty, the cute cat across the street. He enlists the help of her neighbor and they track down her whereabouts. As it turns out, perhaps Misty wasnt kidnapped after all!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas. The scheme works and Grizzy starts scratching himself frenetically. Nonetheless, the bear manages to counter their diversion and expulse the rodents. When they land on a sorcerers hut, the Lemmings take possession of a magic scepter that has the ability to temporarily shrink objects. Now microscopic-sized, the rodents return to the cabin to get their paws on the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is brutally awakened by four Lemmings who are giving a grand percussion concert near the cabin, while the rest of the group dances to the rhythm. The grumpy bear puts an end to the festivities by propelling the Lemmings into the distance. When they land, they discover a magical djembe inside the trunk of a baobab tree. When the percussionists start playing again, the Lemmings and all the other wild animals are possessed by the demon of dance!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: It might be Sunday, but Specs just wont let up: his obsession with Lamput knows no weekends. Skinny, on the other hand, knows just how to spend his day off. Asleep, thats how. Even if his workaholic buddy insists on dragging him through the usual pointless search. The call of a morning coffee wins the day, though; when Specs finally agrees to take a break, he discovers that even orange blobs like a sleep-in. And pancakes. Lots of pancakes.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Beans trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and hes not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre - bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesnt like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, its chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Baby Bop feels left out of the kids game, she tries everything to be included. Barney uses fun, magic and empathy to help her understand that if you cant do what you want, the best thing is to find something else to enjoy.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: During a picnic in the park, Mel isnt being considerate of the environment around her. Barney transforms the kids into butterflies who can talk to the plants and animals. Mel learns its important to respect and be a caretaker of nature.

programme.title: Karbikool
programme.desc: The bugs talk about birthdays.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Its a disaster! Narcissio, the Queens facetious little mirror has made her royal mole vanish! Alice and Lewis promise the monarch theyll solve the problem by giving the mirror what it wants: the power to SHINE! She gives them until teatime to accomplish this. If they fail, both the mirror and Lewis will be shut up in a shoebox forever!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice is tired of losing every competitive situation shes engaged in so far, today, so she decides to run as a candidate for the Wonderland elections, against Lewis: the winner will be the Clocks custodian. The two candidates set about campaigning, to win votes from the Wonderlanders. And, when the time comes to go to the ballots, Alice actually wins, against all odds! But lacking experience, she gets in a total muddle with the clocks workings! Mmm, could she have run against her best friend in the election for the wrong reason? Food for thought…

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Theyre the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.desc: Animated adventure series following Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred as they travel around on what could be their final summer break together. The gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne in the pilot seat!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr Bean

He darts up the tree and wont come back down. / Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr Bean

Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. / While salmon fishing on the riverbank Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. / With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. / The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. / Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks which he immediately clears out of the cabin his enemies stuck to it like stickers. / The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Before taking a nap, Grizzy locks the food cupboard to prevent the Lemmings from getting into it. programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the rangers collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call. programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, theres no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Beans Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. He buys-up all the stickers in the neighbourhood and has almost completed his task when Nephew points out that hes missing one: the famous sticker owned by local footballing celebrity Jamie Studds. Bean turns thief to be the best collector of em all.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. / Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! / Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. / Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge - to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little "pimping" …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand …

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ellas best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyones amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still cant nail it

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But its a metal so rare its only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella always looks forward to Momella Day because they are going to see a small but powerful Red Dwarf star! / Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ellas best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Actors: Ava Augustin, Jack Molloy-Legault, Eleanor Noble, Felicia Shulman, . Director: Freek Quartier,Tom Van Gestel.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Priya has arrived from Earth to complete a school project about Mars. Priya is unfamiliar with the planet and a bit nervous about its huge dust storms. Ella, Slippy and Madhu convince her she needs to visit Mars.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its the Midsummer Festival and everyone is contributing to it, with Badger as the master of ceremonies, the Jack of the Green. But when he finds himself trapped in his own home, how can the festival start?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad installs a new Mauss security system to protect Toad Hall from the weasels but Toads arrogance and rudeness towards Mauss leaves Toad locked out of Toad Hall for good. Only a big mouse sized apology can put things right.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it. The weasels trap Toad in the hammock, leaving Toad Hall wide open for them. Can Toads friends use the hammock to regain Toad Hall?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Missing Pears
programme.desc: Many of the riverbank folk have their eyes on Toads ripe pears. Ratty offers to guard the pear tree all night but in the morning, all the pears are gone thus mounting an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Beans sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace. Beans DIY attempts fail to succeed, and he is left with no other choice but to visit the dreaded dentist. But can Bean brave the Dentists chair? Or will the dentist despair when faced with Beans antics?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but cant escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Beans mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to "break" his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie cant wait to show Barney her new picture -- just as soon as she can find the purple marker she needs to finish it! Barney encourages Vivie to clean up to find it, and Vivie learns that cleaning as you go can help you play!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its the Midsummer Festival and everyone is contributing to it, with Badger as the master of ceremonies, the Jack of the Green. But when he finds himself trapped in his own home, how can the festival start?
